charaepi_ch0160_10_suiren/2301_1101_0100:
[Name:PlayerNickname ] met Lana after long
hours of training.
charaepi_ch0160_10_suiren/2301_1201_0200:
Oh, hello, [Name:PlayerNickname ]. Are you
back from training?
charaepi_ch0160_10_suiren/2301_1201_0400:
But we can liven you up,
[Name:PlayerNickname ]!
charaepi_ch0160_10_suiren/2301_0402_0800: Hehe, no need to be nervous.
charaepi_ch0160_10_suiren/2301_1201_0900: Tapu Lele’s scales have healing powers.
charaepi_ch0160_10_suiren/2301_1201_1000: A light touch of its scales can fix you right up.
charaepi_ch0160_10_suiren/2301_1201_1100:
Now then, Tapu Lele. Could you please heal
[Name:PlayerNickname ]?
charaepi_ch0160_10_suiren/2301_1201_1700:
You seem pretty keen on it, but I’m afraid I can’t
allow any more.
charaepi_ch0160_10_suiren/2301_1201_1800: Tapu Lele’s scales are very powerful. However...
charaepi_ch0160_10_suiren/2301_1201_1900:
If they touch you too much, your body won’t be
able to take it. It can be dangerous.
charaepi_ch0160_10_suiren/2301_1201_2400:
If you don’t tell it to stop, Tapu Lele will keep
sprinkling scales, just for fun.
charaepi_ch0160_10_suiren/2301_1201_2500:
That’s why in my hometown, we say Tapu Lele
is a guilelessly cruel guardian deity.
charaepi_ch0160_10_suiren/2301_1201_2600:
And I agree, especially after becoming a sync pair
and experiencing it firsthand.
charaepi_ch0160_10_suiren/2301_1201_2700:
This Tapu Lele is different from the one that’s
Akala Island’s guardian deity, but...
charaepi_ch0160_10_suiren/2301_1201_2800:
I’m still in awe and intimidated by the thought that
a Pokémon of the same species has accepted me.
charaepi_ch0160_10_suiren/2301_1201_3000:
We were actually looking for an opponent
to battle.
charaepi_ch0160_10_suiren/2301_1201_3100:
The thing is, I’m still not used to battling with
Tapu Lele...
charaepi_ch0160_10_suiren/2301_1201_3200: Would you mind being our opponent?
charaepi_ch0160_10_suiren/2301_0301_3300: Is that why you healed me?
charaepi_ch0160_10_suiren/2301_0302_3500: Was this your plan all along?
charaepi_ch0160_10_suiren/2301_0402_3600: Hehe... Well, what do you think?
charaepi_ch0160_10_suiren/2301_1201_3700:
Now that you’re healed and reenergized, surely
you can battle us, right?
